tfwmdsContentCardProps.name: id
tfwmdsContentCardProps.description: The id of the content card

tfwmdsContentCardProps.name: link
tfwmdsContentCardProps.description: Specifies the link to display the content card component as a clickable navigation card.

tfwmdsContentCardProps.name: linkTitle
tfwmdsContentCardProps.description: Specifies the title of the link to display the content card component as a clickable navigation card.

tfwmdsContentCardProps.name: classes
tfwmdsContentCardProps.description: Classes to add to the content card component.

tfwmdsContentCardProps.name: yellow
tfwmdsContentCardProps.description: Displays the content card with a highlighted (yellow) background. Default value is false

tfwmdsContentCardProps.name: contentHTML
tfwmdsContentCardProps.description: HTML to use within the content card.
